## Analyzing ROI on Prosper Loan Data

<img src="projects-prosper_files/figure-html/Plot_Two-1.png" style="max-width:
500px;">

I analyzed Prosper loan data collected between 2005 and 2014. Prosper is a
marketplace for borrowers and lenders. Borrowers can request 1, 3, or 5-year loans,
and loan sizes tend to be relatively small ($2,000 - $5,000).
